triples.o: sum from m equals zero to N minus one of f-hat of m, multiplied by e to the power of plus j, two pi, m times n divided by N

evidence: Once you have these discrete Fourier components fˆ[ m ], m=0,1,…,N−1, the original functional samples f[n], n=0,1,…,N−1, can be recovered using the inverse discrete Fourier transform:
triples.o: the discrete Fourier components fˆ[ m ]
